Terrible will be the revelations of the day of judgment regarding the neglect of parents to bring up their 
                                                                           86
children in the nurture and admonition of the Lord. What does this mean--in the nurture and admonition of the Lord? It means to teach them to order the life by the requirements and the lessons of the Word; to help them to a clear understanding of the terms of entrance into the city of God. The gates of that city will not be opened to all who would enter, but to those only who have studied God's will, and have yielded their lives to His control.
